abstract: Newell Rubbermaid will simplify its structure, cutting the number of operating groups to two from three, and consolidating plants and distribution centers; changes will result in 500 layoffs.
snippet: The company will cut the number of operating groups to two from three, and consolidate plants and distribution centers. The changes will result in 500 layoffs.
lead_paragraph: The company will cut the number of operating groups to two from three, and consolidate plants and distribution centers. The changes will result in 500 layoffs.

headline.main: Newell Rubbermaid Will Consolidate Its Structure
headline.print_headline: Newell Rubbermaid Will Consolidate Its Structure
headline.seo: Newell Rubbermaid Will Consolidate Its Structure
